image_generation_prompt: Vector art illustration for a TOEIC Part 5 grammar guide. A focused student is quickly solving a glowing, complex grammar puzzle on a futuristic interface. Include subtle visual cues: a stylized 'IF' block for subjunctive mood and swirling arrows for inversion. A small, sleek stopwatch icon in a corner symbolizes speed. The overall mood should be bright, motivational, and empowering, highlighting 'grammar hacks'. Use clean lines and vibrant colors. No text in the image itself. Focus on visual metaphors for speed and problem-solving.

Vector art: Two diverse business professionals, one looking slightly concerned at a laptop screen showing an email icon with a question mark (representing a reminder/request), and the other politely gesturing 'no' with a speech bubble saying 'Unfortunately...' (representing refusal). Background shows a subtle global map or modern office skyline. Overall tone is professional, empathetic, and solution-oriented. Include the text 'Email Etiquette' in a clean, sans-serif font at the top center. Bright, clear, and engaging.

Vector art: Diverse group of professionals in a virtual conference call setting. One person looks slightly puzzled but is politely raising a hand, with a speech bubble above them saying "Could you repeat that, please?". Other participants are attentive. Bright, modern, and professional aesthetic. No text on the main image other than the speech bubble. Clear and encouraging vibe for English learners.

Vector art: A sleek smartphone screen is central, displaying two highlighted, distinct app icons. One icon for 'Pronunciation' (stylized mouth with sound waves & green checkmark). The other for 'Vocabulary' (brain with glowing flashcards). Above the phone, the text 'English App Focus: Pronunciation & Vocab' in a modern, bold sans-serif font, white or light color. Background has subtle abstract learning patterns. Bright, tech-forward, helpful aesthetic, conveying feature comparison.

Vector art: A young person wearing headphones, smiling, sitting comfortably on a sofa with a laptop showing a streaming service interface. Speech bubbles with simple English phrases like "Wow!" or "I get it!" float around. The text "Netflix Shadowing for Beginners" appears subtly on a virtual screen or in the background. Bright, friendly, and motivating style, clean lines and vibrant colors.

Vector art: A confident, diverse speaker on a stage making an impactful opening for an English presentation. Attentive audience members are visibly engaged. Speech bubbles with icons like a question mark, an exclamation point, and a lightbulb float above the audience. The text 'Opening Hooks' in a clean, bold sans-serif font could be subtly placed at the bottom. Bright, professional, and dynamic.

Vector art: Diverse group of people cheerfully engaging in a conversation, with speech bubbles showing simple English phrases like 'Hi!', 'How about you?', and question marks. The overall atmosphere is bright, friendly, and inviting. Include the text 'Small Talk Tips!' in a clean, bold sans-serif font, prominently placed at the top center. Vibrant colors, clean lines, and a focus on positive interaction. Avoid overly complex details, keep it modern and appealing.

Vector art: A confused student looking at a tricky question mark speech bubble, then transforming into a confident student with a lightbulb idea speech bubble above their head. The background shows subtle TOEIC test elements. Include the text "Crack Part 2!" in a dynamic, encouraging font like 'bold sans-serif', positioned at the bottom center. Colors should be bright and motivating, with clear contrasts.

Vector art: A cheerful person writing in a notebook at a desk. Above them, a lightbulb icon and a speech bubble with 'Today was great!'. Desk has a calendar and a plant. Background is bright, inspiring. Text 'English Diary Fun!' in a friendly, bold sans-serif font, perhaps top right corner, suggesting ease and enjoyment for beginners in English writing. Clean, modern, and motivating.

Vector art: A diverse group of professionals engaged in an online meeting shown on a sleek laptop screen. One individual is confidently raising their hand, with a clear speech bubble above them containing the phrase 'May I add something?' in a modern, sans-serif font. The overall atmosphere is bright, positive, and professional, emphasizing successful communication and active participation in English online meetings. Include subtle icons related to collaboration and ideas around the screen. Clean lines and a vibrant color palette.
